text: Chicago Public Schools (CPS) is a system of public schools in the city of Chicago. It is the third largest school district in the United States. CPS reported having 681 schools including 472 elementary schools, 106 high schools, 96 charter schools, and 7 contract schools.Stats and facts About CPS, CPS The current interim superintendent is Dr. Janice K. Jackson since December 2017. ==References== ==Other websites== * Chicago Public Schools Category:Organizations based in Chicago Category:School districts in the United States Category:Schools in Illinois
title: Chicago Public Schools
